text: Bohle ba kholoang ts’enolong ena, ba latelang Bo-juda, Ma- Sabian, Ba-Keresete ng, le Baloing esitana le Bahedeneng, – Ruri! Ke Allah ea tla ahlola lipakeng tsa bona mohla letsatsi la tsoho. Ruri ke Allah U tla ahlola lipakeng tsa bona ka Letsatsi la Kahlolo. Hobane Allah ke paki holima lintho tsohle
